item.description:
Come kick off summer at the most phenomenal women's networking group in the Merrimack Valley!

11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation

1:15 - 1:30 - Open Networking

 

Claim Your Money Power

Women give away their power with money in subtle and not so subtle ways. Learning to claim and step into your power with money takes practice. At first it feels uncomfortable, but over time you gain enormous confidence. In this presentation money expert Maureen Campaiola will lead you through the ways in which you are sabotaging your success and giving away your power with money. She’ll guide the participants into new ways of looking, thinking and behaving with money so you can finally claim and stand in your power once and for all.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
